goals__remit: Westinghouse Electric Company is a leading supplier of nuclear plant products and technologies to utilities throughout the world. Its technology is the basis for half of the world's operating nuclear reactors, including 60% of the ones in the EU. It has operations in seven Member States employing 4000 people.
